But{G1161} God{G2316}, who is{G5607} rich{G4145} in{G1722} mercy{G1656}, for{G1223} his{G846} great{G4183} love{G26} wherewith{G3739} he loved{G25} us{G2248},who
Even{G2532} when{G5607} we{G2248} were{G5607} dead{G3498} in sins{G3588}, hath quickened us together with{G4806} Christ{G3588}, (by grace{G5485} ye are{G2075} saved{G4982};)
And{G2532} hath raised{G4891} us up together{G4891}, and{G2532} made{G4776} us sit together{G4776} in{G1722} heavenly{G2032} places in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}:

That{G2443} in{G1722} the ages{G3588} to come{G1904} he might shew{G1731} the exceeding{G5235} riches{G4149} of his{G846} grace{G3588} in{G1722} his kindness{G5544} toward{G1909} us{G2248} through{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}.

Not{G3756} of{G1537} works{G2041}, lest{G3361} any man{G5100} should boast{G2744}.

For{G1063} we are{G2070} his{G846} workmanship{G4161}, created{G2936} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424} unto{G1909} good{G18} works{G2041}, which{G3739} God{G3588} hath before ordained{G4282} that{G2443} we should walk{G4043} in{G1722} them{G846}.

For{G1063} he{G846} is{G2076} our{G2257} peace{G3588}, who{G3588} hath made{G4160} both{G297} one{G1520}, and{G2532} hath broken down{G3089} the middle wall{G3588} of partition{G3588} between us;

Now{G3767} therefore{G686} ye are{G2075} no more{G3765} strangers{G3581} and{G2532} foreigners{G3941}, but{G235} fellowcitizens{G4847} with the saints{G40}, and{G2532} of the household{G3609} of God{G3588};
